categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Alistar Dadefra was a Human male who served as the captain of the Victory-class Star Destroyer Bombard during the Battle of Khuiumin. He later commanded the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Brazen in the Elrood sector. He was killed in the Star Destroyer's destruction by a group of Rebels.

Alistar Dadefra was a Human male born in 57 BBY. He joined the Imperial Navy, rising to a command level position by 11 BBY. In 1 ABY, Dadefra was in command of the Victory-class Star Destroyer Bombard. Alongside the Crusader, Dadefra smashed the Eyttyrmin Batiiv pirates in the Khuiumin system. Several months later, he was assigned to the Elrood sector, commanding the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Brazen. He was killed when the Brazen was destroyed by Alliance to Restore the Republic agents while it was undergoing repairs at the Derilyn Space Defense Platform.
